name: War Of The Wells - Game Jam Entry
name_original: War Of The Wells - Game Jam Entry
description:
War of the Worlds is over, and the aliens were defeated by bacteria.....but they haven't given up! Now they have recruited a human to help them kill H.G. Wells and stop him writing the end of the book! But the rest of humanity don't want you to succeed in helping the aliens.... (Thanks to Caroline Clark for this blurb)

Features:

  • Co-op gameplay with one other lucky friend!
  • Enemies that try to kill you!
  • Cars that explode!
  • An invisible level exit zone you won't know is there until you move into it!

How To Play: Team up with one player and find your way to the level exit. One players controls the character on-screen, the other controls the alien's laser beam. Avoid the enemies. Kill the enemies with the laser! Find your way to the exit!

Controls: Game controllers preferred. Tested with PS3 and PS4 controllers.

Credits: Made in 2 days (technically over around 25 hours) for the Other Worlds Game Jam in Guildford.

Programmers - Caroline Clark & Nick Stacey

Music/SFX - Stefan Ruffler

Artists - Henry Pitman & Sam Taskis & Mike Ever
